ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clouding message
ygData.msgSnippet: Other camos and specialty spells (e.g. invis to unded) are giving text warnings instead of blinking icons.  And thus the Gawds looked down from the High
ygData.messageBody:
Other camos and 'specialty' spells (e.g. invis to unded) are giving text
warnings instead of blinking icons. And thus the Gawds looked down from the
High Planes and bespoke:

"when a blinking icon is not a blinking icon there cometh a text message
that is a text message and behold --> YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!"

Makes about as much sense as I can make out of it...

Sylly - the bard!

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 12:45 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Sonorous Clouding message

From: <kim@...>

Did anyone else notice the "you feel as if you are about to
become visible" message with invisibility? Of course
Clouding
pulsed again before I became visible. I have to wonder if
this fix (message 5 sec before invisibility blinks off)
didn't
just make Clouding 100% reliable...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
